Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: ooi_gis_map
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Manuel Warum
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: This is a basic OpenLayers widget using OpenStreetMap tiles. It is capable of displaying areas and individual objects of interests on a geographical map. Users can select individual objects of interest by clicking on them. In addition, this widget synchronizes user selection with other connected widgets that support this behaviour, such as the OOI table widget. Data, imagery and map information are provided by OpenStreetMap and contributors under the CC-BY-SA license.

OutputEndpoint.name: center_point
OutputEndpoint.label: Center
OutputEndpoint.description: Sends a signal whenever the shown center changes

OutputEndpoint.name: clicked
OutputEndpoint.label: Click
OutputEndpoint.description: Sends a signal whenever an empty area of the map is clicked

OutputEndpoint.name: drawing
OutputEndpoint.label: Drawings
OutputEndpoint.description: Sends polygons drawn on the map by the user (WKT format)
